column4: hi all ... I need a big help here, please: I bought this webcam Bus 002 Device 002: ID 17a1:0118 and I can't find no solutions to install it on ubuntu...do some ubuntu guru have any tip or idea? cheers
It didn't recognize it when you plugged it in?
no, only listed in lsusb as Bus 002 Device 002: ID 17a1:0118
